entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
